sourcesContent: .projects { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; } .project { display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 20px 0; } .picture { width: 350px; height: 220px; border-radius: 5%; transition: 0.3s ease; } .overlay { position: relative; width: 350px; height: 220px; border-radius: 5%; overflow: hidden; } .overlay::after { content: ""; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.281); transition: 0.3s ease; opacity: 0; } .overlay:hover::after { opacity: 1; } .text { position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); color: #fff; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; visibility: hidden; opacity: 0; transition: visibility 0s, opacity 0.3s ease; } .overlay:hover .text { visibility: visible; opacity: 1; } .project p { margin-left: 20px; max-width: 350px; }
